    A

    addCard(Card) - Method in class Deck
    Adds a single card to the bottom of the deck.
    addCard(Card) - Method in class DiscardPile
    Adds a card to the discard pile.

    C

    Card - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Card class represents a card deck intaking a name, suit, and value.
    Card(String, String, int) - Constructor for class Card
    Constructs a Card object with the specified values

    D

    Deck - Class in Unnamed Package
    Deck Class represents a collection of Card objects Can be created off array of cards, or made as a full, unshuffled standard deck with all four suits Provides methods to draw, shuffle, add cards, reshuffle, and check the current size of the deck.
    Deck() - Constructor for class Deck
    Creates a standard unshuffled 52-card deck.
    Deck(Card[]) - Constructor for class Deck
    Creates a deck using the given array of cards.
    discardCard(Card, DiscardPile) - Method in class Player
    Discards a card from the player's hand into the specified discard pile.
    DiscardPile - Class in Unnamed Package
    The DiscardPile class represents a pile of discarded Card objects.
    DiscardPile() - Constructor for class DiscardPile
    Constructs an empty discard pile with no cards.
    DiscardPile(Card[]) - Constructor for class DiscardPile
    Constructs a DiscardPile using the provided array of cards.
    draw() - Method in class Deck
    Removes and returns the top card of the deck.
    draw(Deck) - Method in class Player
    Draws a card from the given deck and adds it to the player's hand.

    E

    equals(Object) - Method in class Card
    Checks if two cards have the same name, suit, and value, and returns true if so.

    G

    getAge() - Method in class Player
    Returns the player's age.
    getCards() - Method in class DiscardPile
    Returns all cards currently in the discard pile as an array.
    getHand() - Method in class Player
    Returns the player's hand as an array of cards.
    getName() - Method in class Card
    Returns the name
    getName() - Method in class Player
    Returns the player's name.
    getSuit() - Method in class Card
    Returns the suit
    getValue() - Method in class Card
    Returns the value

    H

    HighCardGame - Class in Unnamed Package
    The HighCardGame class runs a simple "High Card" game between two players.
    HighCardGame() - Constructor for class HighCardGame
     

    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class HighCardGame
    Main method that sets up the game, gets player names, deals cards, runs the rounds, and prints the results.

    P

    Player - Class in Unnamed Package
    The Player class represents a player in the card game.
    Player(String, int) - Constructor for class Player
    Constructs a Player with an empty hand.
    Player(String, int, Card[]) - Constructor for class Player
    Constructs a Player with a name, age, and an initial starting hand.

    R

    removeAll() - Method in class DiscardPile
    Removes and returns all cards in the discard pile.
    removeCard(Card) - Method in class DiscardPile
    Removes the specified card from the discard pile and returns it.
    reshuffle(Card[]) - Method in class Deck
    Adds each non-null card from the provided array into the deck.
    returnCard(Card, Deck) - Method in class Player
    Returns a card from the player's hand back into the given deck.

    S

    shuffle() - Method in class Deck
    Randomly shuffles the order of all cards in the deck.
    size() - Method in class Deck
    Returns the number of cards currently in the deck.
    size() - Method in class DiscardPile
    Returns the amount of cards in the discard pile.
    size() - Method in class Player
    Returns the number of cards in the player's hand.

    T

    toString() - Method in class Card
    Returns "(name) of (suit)"
    toString() - Method in class Deck
    Returns the deck's contents in list form.
    toString() - Method in class DiscardPile
    Returns a formatted string listing all cards in the discard pile.
    toString() - Method in class Player
    Produces a formatted string containing the player's name, age, and a complete ordered listing of all cards in the player's hand, starting from the top of the hand to the bottom, ending in a period.
